in_ports.name: mask
in_ports.hint: [Optional] If specified, the result of thresholding is combined with this mask by AND operation

controls.name: thresholds
controls.description: Several (m) thresholds t₁,t₂,...,tₘ, separated by comma/space in ascending order.

controls.name: values
controls.description: Several (m+1) integer values v₀,v₁,v₂,...,vₘ, separated by comma/space. Each pixel of the matrix with intensity w is replaced with first vₖ, for which w≥tₖ, or with v₀ if x<t₁. If this array is too short, it is considered that absent elements vₖ=k.
